alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Comanche (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 8:42PM CDT until August 12 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 842 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Lawtonka, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elgin, Apache, Fletcher, Cyril, Sterling, Medicine Park, Fort Sill, Lake Ellsworth, Lake Lawtonka, Boone, and eastern Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
